Question: In 1983–84, this person made three guest appearances on Family Ties as Elyse Keaton's alcoholic brother, Ned Donnelly.
Hints: This person narrated a video created by Obama for America, entitled The Road We've Traveled.
Later that year, this person starred in the Disney/Pixar animated blockbuster, Toy Story, as the voice of the toy Sheriff Woody.
In an interview with Vanity Fair, this person noted his "modern era of moviemaking ..
